parameters: \msgrows[3]That knight is blocking the ingredients. Maybe
if I could get Teo to talk to him...
\msgrows[1]Should I push the cart and reveal the Hearty Onions?
\msgrows[3]Dropping this will startle the tired Mush-Mom.
It seems kind of evil. Am I sure I want to do that?
\msgrows[3]I already got the mush-mom to drop her mush-hat.
I don't need to do this.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[80]\lspi[95]\lsi[9]\lspiv[8]Have you seen my bab's milk bottle? By the ja-
Oh hush my darling baby, Mama is here.
\msgrows[3]Giving this bottle will silence the baby.
It seems kind of good. Am I sure I want to do that?
I think this is your bottle.
Oh thank you so much! Here, take my mush cap.
You can use it to get past those sprinklers now!
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[80]\lspi[95]\lsi[9]\lspiv[8]Ah! What was that? Not my cap!
Ugh... I just can’t catch a break today...
I don't know how mush more of this I can take.
but you already have one of my mush caps!
I hope you find your onions.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[80]\lspi[95]\lsi[9]\lspiv[8]\lsn<Cursor1>Thank you for finding my baby's bottle.
That watermelon fell but I'm too happy to be scared!
\msgrows[1]If I had ears, they'd be ringing right now.
\msgrows[3]Giving this bottle will silence the baby.
It seems kind of good. Am I sure I want to do that?
I think this is your bottle.
\msgrows[3]I already got the mush-mom to drop her mush-hat.
I don't need to do this.
Maybe if I could get Teo to talk to him...
\msgrows[1]Should I break the mirror and reveal the Ominous Onions?
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk12>\lsv[80]\lspi[85]\lsi[10]\lspiv[8]I don't know why I have to wait here.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk12>\lsv[80]\lspi[85]\lsi[10]\lspiv[8]It's not like the sprinkler's going to get
This mush-hat will keep me dry!
I don’t want to get my head wet.
\msgrows[3]Mush Cap: The cap of a mushroom person. Known
to be incredibly water resistant, and provides excellent shade.
\msgrows[3]Baby Bottle: a bottle used to contain the liquid
that babies drink to calm down after a stressful day.
Excellent for soothing a crying baby of any species.
\msgrows[3]Huh, looks like this melon will fall out
if anything upsets it too much...
\msgrows[3]The falling bean grew the rip in the box.
\msgrows[3]One more bean and that watermelon is falling!
This mush-hat will keep me dry!
I don’t want to get my head wet.
\msgrows[3]It looks like I’ll have to guide Teo to the onions.
I don’t see them so they must be at the end of the aisle.
All I have to do is get Teo over there!
Have you, by chance, seen the onions?
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[100]\lspi[115]\lsi[8]\lspiv[5]Oh, yes sweetie. They’re at the end of the aisle.
You will get wet if you walk under that broken sprinkler.
My mush cap is waterproof, so it keeps me dry!
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09> \lsv[110]\lspi[125]\lsi[5]\lspiv[5]Would you be able to help me then?
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[100]\lspi[115]\lsi[9]\lspiv[5]I need to find my baby’s bottle.
I lost it over by the magic jars, and I cannot
remember the original order of the jars.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[100]\lspi[115]\lsi[9]\lspiv[5]If you can find it I may let you use my mush cap.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[100]\lspi[115]\lsi[9]\lspiv[5]Yes. When I get startled or if I remove it.
Falling objects frigten me, and I get so
startled that my cap pops right off!
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk03>\lsv[100]\lspi[115]\lsi[9]\lspiv[5]Anyways, if you return my baby's bottle I will lend you my cap.
\msgrows[1]Hmm, seems like this knight is blocking the onions.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk10>\lsv[80]\lspi[75]\lsi[11]\lspiv[8]I'm telling you, I don't know if the Kombucha here
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk10>\lsv[80]\lspi[75]\lsi[11]\lspiv[8]Babe, you know I'm on a cleanse.
\msgrows[1]The knight is preoccupied with the man in the mirror.
Maybe we can break the mirror or push their shopping cart away.
\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk10>\lsv[80]\lspi[75]\lsi[11]\lspiv[8]AAAH! Wow. They weren't kidding when they said
they were going to start cracking down on my
\msgrows[3]Perfect. This willl make the stew more powerful.
\msgrows[3]Finally! The first ingredient! Only two more and my
magnificent stew shall be complete! I have to let Teo
know what I need next... Back to the soup can it is.
\msgrows[3]Perfect. This will make the stew more delicious.
\msgrows[3]Finally! The first ingredient! Only two more and my
magnificent stew shall be complete! I have to let Teo
know what I need next... Back to the soup can it is.

\msgrows[3]Baby Bottle: a bottle used to contain the liquid

Excellent for soothing a crying baby of any species.
This place really does need better management.

\msgrows[3]\lsn<talk09>\lsv[80]\lspi[130]\lsi[12]\lspiv[8]WOAH where did that bottle come from?
